game.name: Ser Jorryn
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Ser Jorryn is a retro platformer inspired by the classic arcade games of my childhood, updated with modern responsive controls. A love letter to a time when forced simplicity and pure gameplay came together to create hours of pure magic.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Ser Jorryn is a retro platformer inspired by the classic arcade games of my childhood, updated with modern responsive controls. A love letter to a time when forced simplicity and pure gameplay came together to create hours of pure magic.
